mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS received_message_from_agent ( ID BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, MESSAGE_TYPE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, RECEIVED_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, SENDER_AGENT_ID INT NOT NULL, TO_PHONE_NUMBER VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, FROM_PHONE_NUMBER VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, MESSAGE_CONTENT TEXT NOT NULL ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS send_message_from_gateway_to_telelcom ( ID BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, RECEIVED_ID BIGINT NOT NULL references received_message_from_agent (ID), STATUS INT NOT NULL, RESULT VARCHAR(20) NULL );

UPDATE received_message_from_agent SET message_type = #{message_type}, received_time = #{received_time}, sender_agent_id = #{sender_agent_id}, to_phone_number = #{to_phone_number}, from_phone_number = #{from_phone_number}, message_content = #{message_content} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT message_type, received_time, sender_agent_id, to_phone_number, from_phone_number, message_content FROM received_message_from_agent WHERE ID = #{id}
